meanings.definition: A universal solvent or solvent capable of dissolving any substance.
meanings.sent1: The alkahest effortlessly dissolved the stubborn stain on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use alkahest to dissolve various compounds in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The alkahest was so powerful that it even dissolved the metal spoon!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an emotional alkahest, dissolving all animosity between them.
meanings.sent5: The alkahest's ability to dissolve anything made it a valuable tool in the laboratory.

meanings.definition: A hypothetical universal solvent sought by alchemists.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of alchemists searching for the elusive alkahest to unlock its powers.
meanings.sent2: The alkahest was said to possess magical properties that could transform any substance.
meanings.sent3: The alkahest was believed to be hidden in a secret chamber deep underground.
meanings.sent4: The alkahest symbolized the alchemists' quest for ultimate knowledge and power.
meanings.sent5: The alkahest remained a mystery, driving alchemists to seek its legendary properties.
